article: the white house said tuesday that a florida church 's threat to burn copies of the muslim holy book could endanger u.s. troops abroad , while the state department denounced the idea as `` un-american '' and said it would put american diplomats and travelers at risk .
abstract: obama admin says quran burning endangers troops
